meanings.sent1: I learned about chronaxies in my science class.

meanings.definition: The time required for an electric current to stimulate a muscle or nerve fiber.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the concept of chronaxies to the patient.
meanings.sent2: The chronaxies of the muscle were measured during the test.
meanings.sent3: The chronaxies of the electric current were faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her determination had a chronaxies effect on her recovery.
meanings.sent5: The chronaxies of the nerve fiber were crucial for the diagnosis.
